General.Name: Vente Unique.com
General.Description: Vente-Unique.com SA engages in the sale of furniture and household equipment in France and internationally. The company offers sofas and armchairs; dining and living room furniture; kitchen furniture; bedding room and office furniture; bathroom furniture; spa and sauna products; and garden, hobby, and DIY products. It sells its products through online. Vente-Unique.com SA was founded in 2006 and is based in Le Pré-Saint-Gervais, France.
General.Address: 9/11 rue Jacquard, Le Pre St Gervais, France, 93310
